title: The Golden Land
description: With a loving husband and two small children, Natalie is happy with her lot in life. While helping her mother move house, she finds a little box containing a Burmese artefact. When Natalie learns its unique history in a letter left by her great-great uncle, it sparks off an interest in its country of origin and her uncleâ€™s unfulfilled plans.Her investigations collide with her own rapidly changing circumstances and become the catalyst for a moral dilemma that challenges the foundations of her marriage as she finds herself immersed in two very different golden lands.
author: Di Morrissey
